meanings.definition: The practice or skill of using a bow to shoot arrows.
meanings.sent1: She excelled in archeries, hitting the target every time.
meanings.sent2: The archeries competition was fierce, with many skilled participants.
meanings.sent3: During the archeries tournament, the wind kept blowing her arrows off course.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to archeries was like a steady stream flowing towards mastery.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of archeries lies in the precision and focus required.

meanings.definition: The equipment used in the sport of archery.
meanings.sent1: He carefully inspected the archeries before the competition to ensure they were in top condition.
meanings.sent2: The archeries included bows, arrows, and arm guards.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all the archeries to the range was quite a workout.
meanings.sent4: The gleam of the archeries under the sun made them look like treasures.
meanings.sent5: The archeries gleamed with the promise of a successful day of shooting.

meanings.definition: The act of shooting arrows with a bow.
meanings.sent1: His precise archeries impressed everyone at the event.
meanings.sent2: The archeries displayed by the skilled archer were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: In the heat of the moment, her archeries were unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The archeries of the expert archer seemed to dance through the air.
meanings.sent5: The swift archeries of the competitors filled the arena with excitement.
